long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ContentShake AI for Chrome: the ultimate Chrome extension for dynamic content creation.

Whether you need to check grammar, refine, or simplify copy on the go, ContentShake AI for Chrome has you covered.

üöÄ Enhance your writing with ease

Effortlessly elevate your writing style. Whether you're simplifying complex ideas, changing tone, or summarizing longer text, this tool does it all with a click.

üî• Summarize or rewrite your articles

Find the extension button near the header of your blog posts, news, or articles. Click it to summarize or rewrite content.

üìçWork on any platform or website

Our AI writer will let you create amazing content everywhere you go ‚Äî helping you save time and create powerful copy in one click.

Here‚Äôs what the ContentShake AI for Chrome can do for you:

- Save time and money on content writing and editing
- Simplify and paraphrase your copy in one click
- Fix grammar and highlight difficult sentences
- Optimize your content‚Äôs tone of voice and length 
- Make your copy more engaging and easy to read
- Summarize complex ideas and concepts
- Repurpose your content for various social media platforms
- Unlock features to generate new content 

Pricing

The ContentShake AI Chrome extension has a free plan for all users. Without a ContentShake AI trial or subscription, you have 50 free monthly rewrites from the date of the first rewrite.

You can also access the extension via a ContentShake AI Unlimited Plan or if you have an active free trial of the plan. Learn more at https://www.semrush.com/apps/contentshake/

Terms of Service can be found at https://www.semrush.com/company/legal/semrush-artificial-intelligence-services-terms/
